com.facebook.accountkit.internal

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.accountkit.internal.Utility

  • public final class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
    com.facebook.accountkit.internal is solely for the use of other packages within the AccountKit SDK for Android. Use of any of the classes in this package is unsupported, and they may be modified or removed without warning at any time.

      • assertUIThread

        public static void assertUIThread()
        For thread safety in the LoginManager we want to make sure that the user calls all operations on it from the UI thread. We only log an error so that developers can decide how they write their code though we'll warn.
